name: workout-tracker
description: workout-tracker is a self-hosted fitness log designed for detailed exercise tracking. It records exercises, sets, reps, and notes, and visualizes performance trends through straightforward dashboards.

features.title: Exercise Logging
features.description: Record detailed workout data including exercises, sets, reps, weight, and duration

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View charts and statistics showing strength progression and training volume over time

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Track weight, body fat percentage, and other metrics alongside workout data

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: See workout history in a calendar format to identify patterns and rest days
